Text: It finally came out!! Thank you much STFmaryville

Here I am again making another request... 

I Know you didn't even had the time yet to upload the remaining of the X-Men Classic Run (46-110), but I was wandering if you would have the "X-Men: Mutant Genesis 2.0." hardcover?

The main reason this book is remarkable is because it was remastered and recolored in modern style with beautiful computer colors. I once had this book in my hands but I don't why I didn't buy it, but I still regret not having that version of this book in my collection!

If you still have any doubts, here is the link to Amazon:

http://www.amazon.com/X-Men-Mutant-Genesis-Chris-Claremont/dp/0785163581/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1367082808&sr=8-1&keywords=x-men+mutant+genesis+2.0
